error_app_security_invalid-master-key: La clave maestra que ha proporcionado es incorrecta
error_api_invalid-endpoint: El recurso al que está accediendo no está disponible
error_api_internal-error: Se ha producido un error interno. Vuelva a intentarlo más tarde
error_auth_email-already-exists: El correo electrónico proporcionado ya está siendo utilizado por un usuario existente. Cada usuario debe tener una dirección de correo electrónico única
error_auth_user-not-found: No existe ningún registro de usuario correspondiente al identificador proporcionado
error_api_unauthorized-request: No tiene acceso a este recurso
error_app_security_invalid-invitation-co: Please double-check the code you provided
error_app_generic-desc: An error occurred. Try to refresh the page. If this won’t help, try to fully restart Organized. Note, that this will clear all your unsynced data.
error_app_unsupported-browser-desc: You are using an unsupported browser for the Organized app. Please ensure your browser is up to date and that private or incognito mode is turned off. Alternatively, try using a different browser.
error_app_security_user-not-found: No user found with this email address
error_app_persons_spiritual-status-bapti: A baptized publisher cannot be changed to unbaptized.
A baptized publisher cannot be changed to midweek student.
error_app_persons_spiritual-status-unbap: An unbaptized publisher cannot be changed to midweek student.
error_app_data_invalid-file: Unable to recognize the file you are trying to import.
error_app_data_encrypted-file: Unable to recognize the file because it is encrypted. Disable the encryption before exporting it and try again.
error_api_bad-request: Unable to complete the operation. Refresh the app and try again.
error_api_sync-conflict: Unable to sync changes from the server. Refresh the app and try again, or sync manually.
